title: Chanelle Hayes lets it all hang out on boozy Spanish holiday after admitting ‘extreme’ weight gain left her infertile
text:

Chanelle Hayes has been spotted showing off her ample curves on holiday in Spain - after admitting that her ‘extreme’ weight gain has left her unable to get pregnant. 
Despite previously admitting her health worries, the 29 year old looked happy and carefree as she relaxed in her rainbow bikini by the pool in Alicante. 
The mum of one took a dip in the pool before heading to the showers to cool off. 
As she cleaned off, Chanelle pulled her bikini top down – losing control of her ample assets as she flashed fellow holidaymakers. Read More Chanelle Hayes has a great time on holiday (Photo: FameFlynet) She wore a rainbow bikini (Photo: FameFlynet) 
The TV star, who came to fame in the 2007 Big Brother cycle, then grabbed a cool drink and strutted around the pool in her flip flops. 
She went makeup-free and let her brunette hair hang loose around her shoulders as she relaxed during her Spanish getaway. Chanelle takes a shower (Photo: FameFlynet) She pulls down her top (Photo: FameFlynet) The curvy TV star cools down (Photo: FameFlynet) 
She said won't be able to conceive naturally until she's lost weight properly, according to doctors who are worried the TV personality has messed up her cycle. 
Appearing on today's This Morning, she explained that she's ready to make permanent lifestyle changes after a health scare gave her a wake-up call. 
"I want to have more children - not right now obviously because it's basically impossible - but it's something I want," she told Phillip Schofield and guest presenter Davina McCall. She looks happy and relaxed as she chills by the pool (Photo: FameFlynet) Chanelle heads to get another drink (Photo: FameFlynet) 
"It's absolutely terrifying. I think because I've been so extreme with the way I've been doing things, when I do put weight on, it goes on a lot quicker." 
Size 18 Chanelle has also been suffering from a back injury, which has contributed to her weight gain – but doctors can do nothing about it until she sheds the excess pounds. 
"They did just say your back's never going to get better. I need an operation on it but they said, 'We're not going to do anything on it to your back until you've proved that you can lose weight,'" she went on. Chanelle considers going for a swim (Photo: FameFlynet) She decides against braving the water (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Along with temporary infertility, which is disrupting Chanelle's plans to give six-year-old son Blakely a baby brother or sister, she's also on the cusp of being diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes. 
"They've kind of said if you get any tingling in your limbs or lower limbs and stuff like that. They are keeping an eye on things. They want to do measurements," she added. 
It's not the first time the former Big Brother housemates has made promises to change her ways - back in April 2016 she was grilled by Phillip and Holly after ballooning to a size 16 and having pictures of herself in a bikini spark headlines. The shower is cold too (Photo: FameFlynet) Chanelle relaxes under the water (Photo: FameFlynet) 
At the time, she denied gaining weight in a bid to do her own celebrity fitness DVD, saying: "With the amount of money I've spent on pizzas and doughnuts, even if I did make a DVD I don't think I could break even." 
The former glamour model used to be a size 8, but blamed a food addiction for her weight gain. Like us on Facebook
